activities:
GGNet, Inc. is a technology and data center company that receives personal information for billing, service and support purposes from clients, customers, and/or accounts. Personal data gathered digitally or manually is secured and protected by use of best practices and policies for data security.  

All hosting services are protected and secured to best practices. 

Employees have been trained on the gathering, security and distribution of personal data per the use of these practices and policies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data is covered including organizational, client and customer data, including off-line, on-line and manually processed data.
recoursemech: GGNet, Inc. will comply with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs)
